No weird taste from the can, just cool, refreshing coconut water. Bonus because it comes in single serving size now. ... I love the wai koko ...

They told me Amazon would be selling it...so I patiently waited and now I subscribe to receive 2 cases every month. My husband and I enjoy it at home cold/refrigerated. This stuff is really as good as it gets. I got into the coconut water game about a year ago and have since tried quite a wide variety of brands to find the best one. All it took was a quick little trip to Hawaii to find Wai Koko ...

s: Wai Wai brand instant noodles - Product of Thailand.

Wai Koko is different. Never from concentrate. Straight from the coconut to the can. We searched long and hard for a taste profile that mimics the sweet waters of the Hawaiian coconut. Our coconut water from fresh young Thai green coconuts is the best tasting and most refreshing water on the market. We are confident that you will taste the difference too! It’s what makes us stand apart from every other brand...
